purpose: The email is a call for papers for a special issue of the Journal of Systems and Software focused on 'Intelligent DevOps for Performance, Sustainability, and Reliability.' It outlines the significance of DevOps in software engineering, highlighting both its advantages and challenges regarding software quality. The special issue aims to consolidate recent research and advancements in this area, covering various sub-topics such as observability, AIOps techniques, and intelligent test automation. The submission deadline for manuscripts is set for September 30, 2025.
